import React, { Component } from 'react'; import '../style/Widget.css'; import axios from 'axios'; class Formulaire extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {nom: "MOISE", value: '', places: '0', fond: (1),prepa :(1),echau: (1),jour: (6),mois: (2), annee: (2019), heure : (20), lien: "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTIIXMhM7wIHrNd1YXmvjzsoadndwcrLBtYsCv-klJjKY5SfRan"}; this.ArtistSubmit = this.ArtistSubmit.bind(this); this.AlbumSubmit = this.AlbumSubmit.bind(this); this.TracksSubmit = this.TracksSubmit.bind(this); } ArtistSubmit(event) { const user = { nom: this.state.nom, followers: '5000', birth: "14/01/1997", albums: "Best of" }; axios.put('http://localhost:3030/artistes', {user}) .then(res => { console.log(res); console.log(res.data); }) ///// this.props.onNlien(this.state.lien); event.preventDefault(); } AlbumSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); } TracksSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); } render() { return (

); } } export default Formulaire;
